I’ve known Michelle for 15 years, and she is both a respected leader and a valued resource in the speaking industry. Her “Midas touch” has given rise to countless speakers and raised the bar on the profession.   Michelle’s coaching has helped me structure my keynotes so that I can better connect with my audiences. She is friendly; she is smart; and she is a true professional.

summary: Clint Greenleaf helps companies grow by improving relationships, building culture, grooming leaders, and marketing unconventionally.  A recovering CPA, Clint promotes his message of entrepreneurship, innovation and small business throughout the world as a speaker, business consultant, author and frequent TV guest.Specialties: Book Publishing, Book Distribution, Entrepreneurship, Business Growth
